meanings.definition: Capable of being stretched or extended.
meanings.sent1: The rubber band was very tensible, allowing it to stretch easily.
meanings.sent2: The fabric was tensible, making it simple to adjust the size of the dress.
meanings.sent3: The tensible balloon kept getting longer as more air was blown into it.
meanings.sent4: Her patience was tensible, expanding to accommodate the unexpected delays.
meanings.sent5: The tensible rope could be pulled to reach great lengths.

meanings.definition: Able to be lengthened or expanded.
meanings.sent1: The tensible cord could be extended to reach the outlet.
meanings.sent2: The elastic band was tensible, allowing it to be stretched easily.
meanings.sent3: The tensible story grew longer with each retelling.
meanings.sent4: His tensible knowledge expanded as he continued to learn new things.
meanings.sent5: The tensible rubber band could be lengthened to fit around the box.

meanings.definition: Susceptible to being pulled or stretched.
meanings.sent1: The tensible fabric could be easily pulled to adjust the fit.
meanings.sent2: The balloon was tensible, making it vulnerable to being stretched.
meanings.sent3: The tensible sweater seemed to grow longer every time it was worn.
meanings.sent4: His tensible patience was tested when dealing with the difficult situation.
meanings.sent5: The tensible rubber band was easily stretched to its limit.
